This section contains information about the basic purpose and procedural workings of a Chapter 11 bankruptcy case. It explains the ways in which a Chapter 11 bankruptcy case is different from a bankruptcy case brought under other chapters of the United States Bankruptcy Code (USBC). The section highlights issues of particular signiﬁcance to the IRS in Chapter 11 bankruptcy cases.
